name: Santa Cruz – La Laguna – Taganana
description: A scenic road through urban, forest, and coastal areas, finishing with sweeping ocean views.

name: Sunday Ride
description: Relaxed weekend ride on well-maintained roads with smooth curves and light traffic.

name: Teide Summit Run
description: Challenging ride to Spain's highest peak with tight hairpins and dramatic elevation changes.

name: Anaga Adventure
description: Off-road focused route through the dense Anaga mountains, ideal for enduro riders.

name: Masca – Santiago del Teide – Garachico
description: Twisty mountain roads with breathtaking views, steep cliffs, and coastal descent.

name: Volcanic Gravel Trail
description: An off-road route crossing volcanic trails and sparse terrain in the south.

name: North Coast Explorer
description: Smooth road ride along the lush northern coast, ideal for scenic cruising.

name: Los Cristianos – Vilaflor – Teide – La Orotava
description: A challenging ascent through pine forests to Mount Teide and down to the historic north.

name: Forest Sprint
description: Quick blast through the forest region, with fast corners and changing elevations.

name: Barranco Off-Road Loop
description: Remote off-road loop through ravines and rugged terrain for experienced riders.

name: Candelaria – Güímar – El Teide
description: A spiritual start at Candelaria heading up to volcanic landscapes.

name: Desert Drift
description: Arid off-road ride across southern Tenerife with dry terrain and sparse vegetation.

name: Pine Forest Loop
description: Ride through tall pine trees and twisty roads with fresh mountain air.

name: Teno Rural Park Ride
description: Remote and quiet road with stunning views of cliffs and the Atlantic.

name: Off-Road Ridge Climb
description: Technical off-road route climbing ridgelines with rocky surfaces.

name: Hidden Villages Trail
description: Charming route passing through secluded mountain villages.

name: Coastal Off-Road Blast
description: A fun off-road route hugging the southern coastline with sand and gravel.

name: El Médano Loop
description: Easy-going ride around El Médano with ocean views and beach stops.

name: Lava Field Run
description: Ride across surreal volcanic landscapes formed by ancient lava flows.

name: Highland Gravel Track
description: Gravel road ride in the highlands, ideal for dual-sport bikes.
